casebody.data:
HAWES v. GREEN. March 17, 1884. 3 Pac. 496. Appeal.—Where There is a Failure to Find on a Material Issue, judgment will be reversed. APPEAL from the Superior Court of San Mateo County.

J. C. Bates for appellant; Winans, Belknap & Godoy for respondent.

By the COURT.

The defendant, sheriff, in his answer justified the taking of the property in controversy by virtue of *287an attachment issued against the property of plaintiff’s vendor. There is no finding on the issue raised by the answer as to the averments in justification; the findings are silent upon this subject.

Judgment and order reversed.
